QuestData.Title: Citizens' Army
QuestData.Description: I can barely get these civilians to stand in a straight line.$b$bThey are untrained, undisciplined, and underarmed.$b$bStill, they need to be ready for the real battle.$b$BKhadgar suggested we try some field training at the ruins of Black Rook Hold in Val'sharah. The risen forces of Lord Ravencrest apparently remember how to fight.$b$bGo, hero, and I will send some trainees to support you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat $1oa of Ravencrest's forces at Black Rook Hold in Val'sharah.
QuestData.RewardText: The trainees you helped cannot seem to stop talking about your fighting prowess. Already they are passing along what you taught them.$b$bI appreciate your help in this.
